description: Fantasy Flight Games has announced the release of the “From the Abyss” expansion for the board game Unfathomable. This expansion is now available for purchase at local retailers in the United States and through Fantasy Flight’s online web store. The “From the Abyss” expansion adds new elements to the existing game of Unfathomable, where players...
title: Fantasy Flight Games Launches ‘From the Abyss’ Expansion for ‘Unfathomable’

description: With just under 48 hours remaining, “CatStronauts: The Board Game” has significantly exceeded its initial Kickstarter goal, securing over $33,518 against a $5,000 target. Designed for 1-4 players and suitable for ages 10 and up, the game invites players to join the adventures of Major Meowser, Waffles, Blanket, and Pom Pom as they race against...
title: Final Countdown for “CatStronauts: The Board Game” on Kickstarter

description: Japanime Games has recently announced the acquisition of two established game lines, enhancing its portfolio of anime-inspired board games. These games have now been integrated into Japanime Games’ specialized catalog, focusing on anime-themed entertainment. Aggretsuko: Work/Rage Balance and Sakura Arms are the latest additions. Both games have established fan bases and were selected for their...
title: Japanime Games Adds Two Game Lines to Their Catalogue

description: Sinister Fish Games is set to introduce a new board game, “Yonder,” on Kickstarter, scheduled for July 16th. The game is designed by Haakon Hoel Gaarder, previously nominated for a Golden Geek Award for his work on games like Villagers and Streets. “Yonder” is a fantasy worker placement game designed for 1-4 players. The game...
title: Sinister Fish Games to Launch “Yonder” on Kickstarter
